name: Granola Energy Bars
author: LORITZ
summary: This is not a traditional bar recipe.  It can be made with all organic ingredients if you choose.  It is packed with healthy ingredients that you are sure to enjoy.  All my children comment, 'Mom, I love these things.'  These are great for camping, sporting events, or anytime when you need that extra kick of energy topped with chocolate.
ingredients: 3 ½ cups old fashioned or quick cooking oats
½ cup toasted sesame seeds (such as Sun Luck®)
directions: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a 9x13 inch pan with aluminum foil
Combine the oatmeal, raisins, sunflower seeds, wheat germ, oat bran, flax seeds, cinnamon, and salt in the bowl of a mixer
Mix in peanut butter, honey, and melted butter
Press mixture evenly into prepared pan
Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes
Spread the melted chocolate chips over top; refrigerate until hard, about 30 minutes
